snippet: At the Alfred E. Smith memorial event, a white-tie campaign-year ritual at the Waldorf, attempts at bonhomie went sour....
abstract: Donald J Trump upends tradition of lighthearted barbs between presidential candidates at Alfred E Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner, making jokes in poor taste that visibly upset attendees.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: At the Alfred E. Smith memorial event, a white-tie campaign-year ritual at the Waldorf, attempts at bonhomie went sour.

headline.main: Donald Trump Heckled by New York Elite at Charity Dinner
headline.print_headline: In Night of Punch Lines, Trump’s Routine Prompts New York’s Elite to Heckle
